name: post_task_assignments
description:
Assigns a task to a user.

A task can be assigned to more than one user by creating multiple
assignments.

assign_to.description: The user to assign the task to.

id.description:
The ID of the user to assign to the
task.

To specify a user by their email
address use the `login` parameter.

login.description:
The email address of the user to assign to the task.
To specify a user by their user ID please use the `id` parameter.

task.description: The task to assign to a user.

type.description: The type of the item to assign.

$block: A task assignment defines which task is assigned to which user to complete.

$ul: **assigned_at**: The date at which this task was assigned to the user.
